long_description: A scaled-down version of the original, this colorful flyer is designed specifically for small dogs. An exciting playmate for your dog to chase-just give this flyer a toss and watch the fun begin. Tough, durable construction features a flexible inner frame, rubber feet and heavyweight nylon decking. Squirrel's spinning feet and contrasting colors create visual excitement for your pet to follow; raised sides make it easy to pick up.
short_description: A scaled-down version of the original, this colorful flyer is designed specifically for small dogs.
